archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.1.7d: d) maintaining the confidentiality and integrity of any transactions (e.g. orders, delivery address details and confirmation of receipts), including avoidance of loss or duplication of transaction information
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
